facts.title: Most Speakers?
facts.description: Mandarin Chinese has the most native speakers, with over 1.1 billion people speaking it as their first language.

facts.title: Longest Alphabet?
facts.description: The Khmer language of Cambodia holds the record for the longest alphabet, with 74 letters.

facts.title: No 'A' or 'B'?

facts.title: Click Languages
facts.description: Some African languages, like Xhosa and Zulu, use click consonants as part of their phonology.

facts.title: Evolving English
facts.description: The English language adds approximately 4,000 new words to its dictionary each year.
